general_profile.concept: Sae-oe Murim (새외무림 / Outside the Great Wall)
general_profile.definition: Martial arts factions located outside the Central Plains (Jungwon/China).
characteristics: Exotic & Foreign: Different customs, clothing, and martial arts philosophies.
Unorthodox Alignment: Often treated as Sapa (Unorthodox) or Neutral because they don't follow Jungwon's moral codes.
Family/Tribe Structure: Often organized by bloodlines or religious hierarchies rather than sect master/disciple relationships.

north_bukhae.geography: Lake Baikal or Por-Bajin Ruins. Eternal winter, ice storms.

factions.name: 북해빙궁 (North Sea Ice Palace / 北海氷宮)
factions.specialty: Ice Arts (Bing-gong), Yin Energy. Rulers of the North.

south_nanman.geography: Southeast of Yunnan (Vietnam, Laos borders). Dense jungles, poisonous swamps.

factions.name: 남만야수궁 (Southern Beast Palace / 南蠻野獸宮)
factions.specialty: Taming Beasts (Tigers, Elephants, Snakes). Brutal physical arts.

factions.name: 독곡 / 오독문 (Poison Valley / Five Poison Sect)
factions.specialty: Using Gu (poison insects) and venomous plants.

west_seojang.geography: Tibetan Plateau. High altitude, spiritual atmosphere.

factions.name: 포달랍궁 (Potala Palace / 布達拉宮)
factions.specialty: Lamaism (Tibetan Buddhism), Red Handprints (Blood Arts). The political and religious center.

factions.name: 뇌음사 (Thunder Sound Temple / 雷音寺)
factions.specialty: Ancient Buddhist Arts. Often rivals Shaolin. Divided into Great (Good) and Small (Evil) factions.
factions.conflict: Hindu influence (sometimes linked to Demonic Arts origin).

factions.name: 살막 (Murder Screen / 殺幕)
factions.type: Assassin Guild hiding in the desert.

excluded_regions.note: Often excluded or minimized in Korean Wuxia to maintain immersion.

narrative_role: Invaders: A massive invasion force (e.g., Beast Palace riding elephants) challenging the Murim Alliance.
Exotic Allies: A character with strange abilities (Ice/Beast Taming) joining the protagonist's party.
The Unknown: A source of ancient, lost, or forbidden techniques (e.g., Origin of Demonic Arts from India or Persia).
